events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer position submitted by the candidate on April 30th.
The candidate's application for the software engineering role has been reviewed and categorized under Engineering.
Recruiter John Smith has been assigned to manage the hiring process for this software engineer candidate.
Initial phone screening was conducted with the candidate, who demonstrated strong software development fundamentals.
The candidate responded positively to the initial screening feedback and expressed eagerness to proceed to technical interviews.
A technical interview has been scheduled for May 6th at 10:00 AM with the lead software architect.
